title: Spartacus.War.of.the.Damned.DVDR.R4.NTSC-ANGELiC
description:
The plot begins months after Gaius Claudius Glaber death . The rebels , led by Spartacus ( Liam McIntyre ) , Crixus ( Manu Bennett ) , Gannicus ( Dustin Clare ) and Agron ( Dan Feuerriegel ) continue paving the way to Rome . Adding more than 30 thousand former slaves , rebels pose an immediate danger to the Roman Republic , which enlists the help of Marcus Crassus ( Simon Merrells ) , a political strategist . Accustomed to respect his opponents , he does not want to make the same mistakes as its predecessor . With the help of a young and competitive warrior named Julius Caesar ( Todd Lasance ) , Crassus is determined to eliminate the rebellion.





Liam McIntyre : Spartacus

Simon Merrells : Marcus Crassus
